text:
Premise of Hobbs & Shaw: This movie takes place two years after the events of the latest
    Fast and Furious movies (The Fate of the Furious). Luke Hobbs and Deckard Shaw are two men from different
    agencies, who dislike each other quite a bit, have to team up to take down a man named Brixton Lore
    (played by Idris Elba). Lore is a cyber-genetically enhanced international terrorist who has created a deadly
    virus that could threaten the human race... Just the usually buddy cop, save the world movie.
author: NQ

text:
Luke Hobbs, played by Dwayne Johnson, is a federal afent working for the Diplomatic Security
      Service (DSS). His initial plot line in the F&F movies was to hunt down and capture the main character of the
      F7F movies, Dominic Toretto along with the ex-cop Brian O'Connor. He later starts to work with the F&F
      crew and became a member of their team.
author: NQ

text:
Deckard Shaw, played by Jason Statham, is a former British Special Forces assassin who turned
    mercenary. He was imprisoned by Hobbs after he killed Han Seoul-Oh. He killed Han after a defeat against
    the F&F crew and was later arrested and relocated to a maximum security prison by Hobbs.
author: NQ
You friendly neighborhood short stack of pancakes

text:
You know the original Lion King as a classic retelling of Shakespeare's Hamlet. Now,
    dive into the magit of Lion King 2; based off of Romeo and Juliet. Kovu, Scar's chosen son, meets Simba's daughter Kiara, and the epic romance unfolds
auhtor: James Earl Jones, Mathew Broderick, Nathan Lane

text: A classic, Jaws! A nice, friendly shark is the unfair victim of persecution in a beach community.
author: Roy Scheider, Richard Dreyfuss, Robert Shaw

text:
Long Shot: This romatic comedy of 2019 truly shocked a lot of Seth Rogan
    fans. Fred Flarsky, played by Seth Rogan, is a gifted journalist who has a knack for getting himself
    in trouble. Fred unexpectedly runs into Charlotte Field, played by Charlize Theron, who is a
    smart and accomplished politicial who decided that she is going to run for the presedency.
    Charlotte is Fred's former babysitter and childhood crush. Once she accounces her running
    she decides to hire Fred as her speechwriter and something unexpected insues.
author: NQ

text:
OKAY WHO'S AS EXCITED TO SEE THIS AS ME? Peter Parker, played by
    Tom Holland (swoon), goes on a school trip to Europe where he wants to take a break with his
    friends. Little does he know he is about to fight along side Mysterio, played by Jake Gyllenhaal,
    against the Elementals. No spoilers. Spiderman is the best Marvel hero!
author: NQ

text: The Good, the Bad, and the Ugly
author: Clint Easwood
